ygData.subject: RE: [archive-crawler] Heritrix in Eclipse
ygData.msgSnippet: The URL to the Heritrix GitHub account should, of course, be https://github.com/internetarchive/heritrix3.git. Sorry about that. - Kris ... Landsbókasafn
